column1: #Text=New from Statscan today - Canadian manufacturing sales increased 1.7% in July, after a revised increased June figure of 1.5% and May of 0.7%.
#Text=Why didn't the Amazing Jeffy Kreskin Simpson predict that?
#Text=He's been complaining about the supposed 'poor' state of the Canadian economy for months.
#Text=Oh, it doesn't fit his three times per week false anti-Conservative partisan columns.
